WorkItem.Description:
2.2.5, trying to optimize both a cat and bear set, happens regardless of re-gem/-enchant/food toggles in the optimizer setting.  Rolling back to 2.2.4 fixes it.  Tried with a fresh install as well, though not with a from-scratch character.
